channel.title: Why cant people login my server?
channel.description: I have portforwarded and I set my ip and all of that but, my problem is that when people click the login button they dont login but their account has been created. I figure that they must be logging in and then it makes them disconnect. I can see their ip and their username and all of that when they login but it seems they are not on the server. I have no-ip and java and all the stuff i need in the tutorial. the only problem is some people can create an account but not be on. My friend tried logging on but it doesnt show that he tried to login and his account hasn't been created kinda weird. Runelocus and Mopar status checker says that my server is online when i register it. Can someone please give me tips or hints on what is wrong? I need serious help Thank You!

item.title: Why cant people login my server?
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

[quote=“f0r_th3_l0s3, post:5, topic:301276”]I am using a 2speced based server and client nuthing is wrong inside of client.java
I already opened my port[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2009, 05:02:20 pm[/size][hr]-I even tried different clients and servers[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2009, 05:52:46 pm[/size][hr]The players log in and then right back out
thats all i need to know is why??[/quote]

see what happens when you disable our firewall and if you have antivirus firewall disable that too. but first, to check if it is a problem with your server or your configuration, download another server dont edit it or anythign just run it and see if people can log on. if they can log on then something is wrong with your old server. if they cant log on then something is wrong with your firewall or port forwarding configuration.

Read full topic
item.source: Why cant people login my server?

item.title: Why cant people login my server?
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

ok try this go to control panel select windows firewall and click add port for name type 43594 for port type 43594
2 option dont use moparscape webclient taht always hapopens with my server
3rd if your using a client open its client.java and serch for the ip and port and see if thers anything wrong with that

item.title: Why cant people login my server?
item.dc:creator: @f0r_th3_l0s3 f0r_th3_l0s3
item.description:
@f0r_th3_l0s3 wrote:

I have portforwarded and I set my ip and all of that but, my problem is that when people click the login button they dont login but
their account has been created. I figure that they must be logging in and then it makes them disconnect. I can see their ip and their username
and all of that when they login but it seems they are not on the server.
I have no-ip and java and all the stuff i need in the tutorial.
the only problem is some people can create an account but not be on.
My friend tried logging on but it doesnt show that he tried to login and his account hasn’t been created kinda weird.
Runelocus and Mopar status checker says that my server is online when i register it.
Can someone please give me tips or hints on what is wrong?
I need serious help
Thank You!

Read full topic
